thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: Mr. MICHAEL GRACE
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Mr. MICHAEL GRACE

author: Mr. MICHAEL GRACE
title: Mr. MICHAEL GRACE
text: Donovan at SkyLux was very professional and helpful in helping me book our flights, as well as being patient in working with me while I worked out all of the other details. I highly recommend SkyLux if you're considering utilizing them for your travel needs. Amazing service with the lowest prices... what more could you ask for?!?
